sentences.sContent: Everyone cries sometimes – it’s nothing to be ashamed of.
sentences.sCn: 每个人都会有哭的时候——没什么好难为情的。

synos.tran: 惭愧的，感到难为情的；耻于……的

phrases.pCn: 难为情，害臊；对…感到羞耻；对…感到惭愧

remMethod.val: 来自shame(n. 羞耻， 羞愧)

trans.tranOther: feeling very sorry and embarrassed because of something you have done
